title.narrative: LCB-NREE: Lake Chad Basin Regional Program for the Conservation and Sustainable Use of Natural Resources and Energy Efficiency (PROGRAM)

description.narrative: Incorporate sustainability in productive landscape , .Strengthening capacity and knowledge and sustainable financing for climate resilient mobilization for IWRM and WUE in the Lake Chad basin,Strengthening capacity and knowledge and sustainable financing for climate resilient mobilization for IWRM and WUE in the Lake Chad basin,Strengthening of water and ecosystems management and riparian collaboration ,Program Management Cost,Increase efficiency of approaches and tools related to the consumption of Natural Resources and Energy to bring GEBs
